SEARCH

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Game allows users to play a game of UNO Flip
Author:
Angus Jull, Brian Tran - Modified for MVC, Aashna Verma - Modified for Flip
See Also:

      Plays a card from the players hand to the deck

    • advanceCurrentPlayer

      public boolean advanceCurrentPlayer()
      Changes the current player in the current direction, and sets the round to no longer be over
      Returns:
      true if the player was changed, false otherwise

    • nextPlayer

      private Player nextPlayer(Player player)
      Returns the next player to play in the game
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose turn it currently is
      Returns:
      The next player whose turn it is, or the current player if nobody is next

    • processChoiceStatus

      private void processChoiceStatus(Card choice)
      Changes the topCard and gets colour for wild cards
      Parameters:
      choice - is the card played

    • processChoice

      private void processChoice(Card choice)
      Decide what to do based on the card played. Append to the status string with what is done with the player's choice
      Parameters:
      choice - The card that was played on the currentPlayer's turn

    • handleWild

      private Colour handleWild(Card wild)
      Handle the user input for playing a wild card, in choosing a colour and setting that colour
      Returns:
      A card with the chosen colour, or the top card if the top card is not a wild card.

    • getPoints

      private int getPoints()
      Calculates the points the current player gets from winning the round
      Returns:
      the total points of all players hand EXCEPT the winning players
